channel.title: Paladin is broken atm
channel.description: #### What happened? It is only letting me smite N1 - 3 and not letting me use test faith until N4 #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Supposed to only be able to test faith N1 - 3 and smite N4 #### Steps to reproduce: Play Paladin #### Comments: shits broken m8

item.title: Paladin is broken atm
item.dc:creator: dlxhazedxlb
item.description:
What happened?

It is only letting me smite N1 - 3 and not letting me use test faith until N4

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Supposed to only be able to test faith N1 - 3 and smite N4

Steps to reproduce:

Play Paladin

Comments:

shits broken m8
